CausalLearning.algorithms.tigramite_algorithm package

Submodules

CausalLearning.algorithms.tigramite_algorithm.TigramiteAlgorithm module

class TigramiteAlgorithm(algorithm)[source]

Bases: object

init_algo(data_info)[source]
prepare_data(Data, parameters)[source]
output_to_array(output)[source]

Covert tigramite graph to numpy array Parameters ———- tigramite_graph : graph from tigramite (0time series graph) var_names : the variable names

matrixa numpy array of size N*N where N is the number of nodes

matrix(i, j) = 2 and matrix(j, i) = 3: i–>j matrix(i, j) = 1 and matrix(j, i) = 1: io-oj should appear only in PAGs matrix(i, j) = 2 and matrix(j, i) = 2: i<->j should appear only in MAGs and PAGs matrix(i, j) = 3 and matrix(j, i) = 3: i—j should appear only in PDAGs matrix(i, j) = 2 and matrix(j, i) = 1: io->j

if n_lags is not None then the first indexes of matrix correspond to the nodes of the time lag=0, then to time lag=1 etc

run(data, parameters, prepare_data=True)[source]
